resources.string: By signing up, you agree to the privacy policy
When logging in as visitor, you don\'t need to fill the email and password fields. Clicking the \'Login as visitor\' button will log you in with a random userId

Looks like you have not added your application Id in your app level build.gradle file. Please provide your application ID in app level build.gradle file\'s defaultConfig Refer here. Replace <Your-APP-ID> with the application ID obtained from Kommunicate dashboard.
